name: form5500_planname
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool form_5500_data.
Tool description: Get information from all US Corporate Retirement plans from the Form 5500.
API description: Retrieves information about a specific plan based on the provided Employer Identification Number (EIN) using the Form 5500 API.

ein.description: Employer Identification Number (EIN) for the plan.
